data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konwert, Martin, Stumpf, Sebastian (2017): Exceptionally preserved Leptolepidae (Actinopterygii, Teleostei) from the late Early Jurassic Fossil-Lagerstätten of Grimmen and Dobbertin (Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, Germany). Zootaxa 4243 (2): 249-296, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4243.2.2|24 occurrences
